name: Shotumi
description:
Space Shooter into the space sea. 

How can I play ?

  • With the arrows of the keyboard right and left key : to rotate 
  • Up : move around. 
  • Space bar : attack.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Project developed in Python during my game developer's formation (Interface 3).

I love sharkwhales so...
